structure.unit: ARTICLE LXIV. EMPOWERMENT PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT TRUST

law.catch_line: County committment to match federal funds.

text.section:
Sec. 2-857. County committment to match federal funds.
In the event Miami-Dade County is selected as a Federal Empowerment Zone, The County Manager's recommended budgets over the next succeeding ten (10) years shall include funding in an amount equal to at least 100 percent of the Empowerment Zone grant. These funds shall be used to implement and carry out Empowerment Zone initiatives. Such County sources shall not include funding from Federal, State, or other local governments or private entities.
